title: # 422 - Matt Iseman & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with comedian, actor and TV Host Matt Iseman. You may know Matt from American Ninja Warrior, Winning The Apprentice, Live Rescue and more! We talk about quitting medicine and doing comedy, people pleasing, The Last Dance Documentary, Going to Princeton, and much more! 

This Episode was brought to you by Hims. Get your first visit for free at http://www.forhims.com/Bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly. 

This episode is also brought to you by “Paint Your life”. Text BERTCAST to 64-000 and get 20% off plus free shipping.

This episode is also brought to you by LMNT. Get the LMNT Variety Pack to sample all of their flavors. Go to http://www.drinkLMNT.com/BERT to check it out. 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
